Governance, Risk and Compliance SpecialistPlacement in Surabaya (Hybrid) About SuperWe are a group of business enthusiasts, scientists, communicators, designers, productive mothers, and many more who are unified and unduly spirited to work towards one big vision and goal. As a leading social commerce platform in Indonesia, we aim to solve economic inequality distribution across rural areas by building agent networks and hyperlocal supply chains to make goods more affordable. Aplikasi Super goes beyond passion and creativity to decipher social issues in our surroundings. Key Responsibilities:Brainstorming to define governance structures, roles, and responsibilities to ensure effective decision-making and accountability.Collaborate with superiors in identifying potential risks, evaluating their potential impact, and working to implement risk mitigation plans based on reviews from superiors.Implement organizational compliance programs, ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and internal policies.Monitor regulatory changes, assess their impact on the business, and strive to maintain compliance.Collaborate with all functions in developing and updating internal policies and procedures to align with regulatory requirements and industry best practices, based on approval from superiors.Preparing reports on insights into organizational risk profiles, whistleblowing, gratuities, compliance status, and recommended improvement actions. Requirements:Minimum Bachelor's degree (S1) in Business Administration/Risk Management/Finance/Information Systems/Related field.Minimum 2-3 years in risk consulting/risk management.Have a strong understanding of relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards.Possesses skills in risk assessment, mitigation strategies, and crisis management.Demonstrate excellent communication skills for collaboration.Exhibit strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to address complex GRC challenges.Possesses writing skills to draft company regulations.Capable of being principled and ethical in handling confidential and sensitive information.Maintain a proactive and strategic mindset to drive GRC initiatives and promote a culture of compliance and risk awareness. Join SuperAt Super, we are continuously providing equal, unparalleled opportunities across various business operating pillars from operations, commercial, and technology for all candidates from diverse types of backgrounds and expertise.If you are someone with a high passion for delivering innovative work as part of your extraordinary career, are committed to self-integrity, enjoy working collaboratively, and are ready to work in an agile environment, you are very welcome to apply. You will also have tremendous opportunities to hone your functional skills and expertise in an area of specialization. The sheer variety of work we do, and the inherent experience of creating meaningful social impact it offers, provide an unbeatable platform from which to build a fulfilling career.#GabungSedulurSuper and help solve Indonesia's unequal economic distribution

The only limitation is you! AIA is one of the largest insurance companies in Asia and also one of the leading insurance companies in Indonesia in the field of Bancassurance. Joining AIA Premier Bancassurance Life Consultant (PBLC) means that you will gain experience working in insurance as well as in banking. In addition, AIA partners with the largest and leading banking institutions in Indonesia so as to provide you with an opportunity to develop your network in these brands to the fullest. As a PBLC, you will be placed in one of the bank branches affiliated with AIA, where You can provide protection and investment solutions that suit your customers' needs. Cahaya Poles Mulia, mengembangkan bisnisnya ke pasar retail & membuat brand pembersih bernama POLKI. Facility: Positive work environment that fosters growth and development., The chance to work closely with Singaporean medical culture and treatments, Opportunities for media exposure, including collaborations with celebrities.
Job Description: Job Description:Conducting consultations with patients and developing patient treatment plans for Aesthetics and Trichology. Promote a friendly, warm and exceptional customer experience with the ability to cross-referrals to other Astute subsidiaries.Developing and directing various clinical research study projects related to company treatments, skincare products, trichology, and medical devices. Perform activities that help with promoting clinic services such as visiting doctors’ clinics, conducting public educational seminars, workshops, masterclasses and etc. Employee education as well as participation in the development of training programs related to the treatments and products being sold by the company.Write articles for the company’s social media platforms not limited to Facebook, Instagram or Website and etcCollaborate with the medical board to update, amend, and replace medical policiesAct as the medical expert in dealing with vendors or suppliers, and non-medical facilities that work within the organization.Participating in the oversight of the quality assurance and quality improvement programs related to the company’s activities, and ensuring that outlet employees are complying with medical licensing policies when providing care.Ensuring that the company is compliant with regulations and certifications relating to Local Authority: MOH, NEA, and other licensing matters, device use, and training.Overseeing medical record maintenance to ensure the Organization and the outlet’s programs meet all local and federal regulations and are compliant with all the rules and regulations as implemented by the Local law for the medical industry.  Ensure that the company maintains appropriate electronic and paper records.To recruit and manage junior physicians and responsible for the training, continuing education, and promotion of subordinate staff.To examine and coordinate various practice activities to guarantee the medical quality of the facility Requirements:Prior Experience in Aesthetics or related industry will be an advantage.At least 1 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.   Company overview:Astute Medical Holdings (Singapore) has been a trailblazer in delivering medical expertise and aesthetic solutions to enhance your desired appearance since 2017. With a dedicated team of experienced medical doctors and consultants boasting a solid track record within the industry, we are committed to augmenting your natural beauty through cutting-edge technology and specialized medical knowledge.Recognizing the significance of tailoring treatment programs to address individual concerns related to the face, skin, body, and hair, we ensure that each client achieves their desired goals and results. Innovation is ingrained in our brand ethos, as we continually refine and develop our treatments to deliver optimal results tailored to the unique needs of our clients. IndustryAesthetics & Beauty Services Company size11-50 employees At Astute Medical Holdings (Singapore), we function as a highly experienced and dynamic Aesthetic Medical Clinic, supported by seasoned Senior Aestheticians and a team of Partners with established and successful Healthcare Practices. Through strategic partnerships with Aesthetic Machine Suppliers, our doctors gain direct access to the latest aesthetic technology, enabling us to better meet the expectations of our clients. We are deeply committed to a structured protocol that nurtures growth and development in Singapore, with aspirations to inspire further expansion across Southeast Asia. Surabaya has been earmarked as our initial launch city in the region.If you possess a fervent passion for staying abreast of the latest trends in aesthetics and thrive in an environment that champions continuous improvement, we extend a warm invitation for you to lead our experienced team. Why join us?Opportunity to join a dynamic company with the potential for personal and career growth within the organization.Positive work environment that fosters growth and development.Opportunities for media exposure, including collaborations with celebrities.The chance to work closely with Singaporean medical culture and treatments, addressing all aesthetic concerns comprehensively.

Job Description: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Pre-Sales Engineer / Project Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for providing technical expertise in pre-sales activities, including solution design, product demonstrations, and client consultations. Additionally, the candidate should possess strong project management skills to oversee the successful implementation of security system projects.Responsibilities:Collaborate with the sales team to understand customer requirements and design tailored security solutions.Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase the features and benefits of our security systems.Engage with clients to assess their security needs and provide expert advice on suitable solutions.Prepare technical proposals, including system architectures, bill of materials, and cost estimates.Assist in the preparation of project plans, timelines, and resource allocation for successful project execution.Coordinate with vendors and internal teams to ensure the availability of necessary resources and support for project implementation.Act as the primary point of contact for clients throughout the project lifecycle, addressing any technical queries or concerns.Conduct regular project reviews to monitor progress, identify risks, and implement corrective actions as needed.Provide technical guidance and support to junior team members as required.Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.Proven experience in pre-sales engineering within the security system industry.Strong understanding of security technologies such as CCTV, access control, intrusion detection, and video analytics.Proficiency in project management methodologies and tools.Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively interact with clients and internal stakeholders.Ability to multitask and prioritize workload in a fast-paced environment.Experience with leading project teams and driving successful project outcomes.Relevant certifications such as PMP, CISSP, or CCNA are a plus.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan:Melakukan pemantauan dan pengecekan secara terus menerus terhadap penatalaksanaan layanan radiologi untuk memastikan bahwa standar dan prosedur yang telah ditetapkan oleh Rumah Sakit dijalankan secara benar dan konsisten.Melaksanakan pemeriksaan radiografi yang meliputi radiografi konvensional, fluoroskopi, mammografi, CT Scan, MRI, foto mobile di ruangan, operasional C-arm di ruangan operasi, dan menyiapkan USG sesuai dengan prosedur dan standar mutu dan keselamatan yang telah ditentukan untuk digunakan sebagai penunjang layanan medis/diagnosa dokter. Kualifikasi Pekerjaan:  Minimal D3 Radiologi / Radioterapi.Memiliki pengalaman minimal 3 tahun sebagai RadiograferMemiliki STR yang masih berlakuMampu bekerja sama dalam timBersedia untuk bekerja di Area : Surabaya

Alam Dianraya.Mengontrol dan mengkoordinir pengecekan kualitas dan kebenaran design, plate dan pekerjaan-pekerjaan lain dari luar.Mengkoordinir jalannya proof mulai persiapan sampai dengan disetujui oleh marketing atau customer.Mengontrol dan memastikan bahwa setiap produk yang akan di produksi harus ada standard warna dan fisik yang valid dan up to date.Mengkoordinir pembuatan, penyimpanan, pembaruan/updating, pendistribusian dan pendokumentasian standard mutu produk agar tetap terjaga validitas dan kebersihannya.Mengkoordinir R&D ketika ada material baru / improvment yang masuk untuk di lakukan pengujian barang tersebut hingga keluar rekomendasi tentang qualitas barang tersebut.Mengkoordinir kalkulasi box untuk ukuran box yang akan dipakai / mencari box alternatif untuk memenuhi kebutuhan produksi.

Tentang PekerjaanBusiness Development akan berhubungan langsung dengan jaringan asuransi. Anda akan memiliki peran penting dalam memajukan dan mengembangkan kemitraan dengan agen asuransi dan agensi asuransi. Tujuan utamanya adalah mendorong pertumbuhan bisnis melalui kolaborasi strategis dan hubungan manajemen yang efektif. Lokasi :  Surabaya, IndonesiaDeskripsi Pekerjaan:Mendukung Business Development Manager dalam strategi untuk meningkatkan keterlibatan dengan klien yaitu agen asuransi dan perusahaan agensi asuransiMenjual layanan DA medical concierge, dan mengembangkan pipeline bisnisMengidentifikasi, mengkualifikasi, dan mencari prospek penjualan baru untuk layanan DA medical conciergeMenjalin kerjasama dengan agen asuransi dan perusahaan agensi asuransi yang potensial guna memperluas pengguna layanan DA medical concierge dan layanan medis lainnyaBerkomunikasi dengan klien untuk memastikan pelayanan DA medical concierge berjalan dengan tepat dan efisienMendukung sales campaign dan acara yang terkait dengan klienMempersiapkan proposal kerjasama dengan klienMelakukan presentasi penjualan kepada calon klienMengembangkan dan menjalankan strategi pengembangan bisnis yang tepat untuk bekerja sama dengan klien.Membangun komunikasi yang baik dengan agen asuransi dan perusahaan agensi asuransi khususnya di level manajerial.Mengikuti dan memahami trend market medical concierge.Berkomunikasi dengan tim internal untuk memastikan kelancaran pelayanan dan pemenuhan kebutuhan klienMembuat sales report secara reguler  Kualifikasi :Gelar Sarjana dengan pengalaman 2-3 tahun dalam marketing, business development, atau account management di lingkungan penjualan B2B industri asuransi dan rumah sakit atau kesehatanBerpengalaman bekerjasama dengan agen asuransi dan agensi asuransiProaktif dan terbiasa bekerja dengan targetBerorientasi pada pelanggan dengan keterampilan interpersonal, komunikasi verbal, tulis dan keterampilan presentasi yang baikTerorganisir, detail - oriented, sehingga dapat memastikan pertemuan dengan klien terlaksana dengan baikFamiliar dengan Google Workspace, sosial media (LinkedIn, Instagram) dan media online lainnyaBerdomisili di SurabayaSikap yang sesuai dengan budaya startup - berani mengambil tanggung jawab penuh atas tindakan Anda, bersedia keluar dari zona nyaman dan menghadapi tantangan baruNyaman dengan ketidakpastian dan fleksibel untuk belajar hal-hal baru sebagai hal yang menyenangkan - kami terus berkembang dan menuju pencapaian baru About Doctor AnywhereDoctor Anywhere (DA) is a regional tech-enabled, omnichannel healthcare provider delivering care to 2.5 million users across 6 countries in Southeast Asia. Founded in 2017 with a mission to make healthcare simple, accessible, and efficient for all, DA leverages technology to enable individuals towards preventive, long-term health via holistic offerings including our telehealth app, physical clinics and pharmacies, mental wellness, specialist consults, and also an online health & wellness marketplace for supplements, healthy snacks, home-based health screening and vaccinations.DA’s goal is to build a regional digital healthcare ecosystem, advanced by the 3,000 GPs and specialists within our regional network, over 1,000 corporate organisations, and 25 regional insurers we work with. Grounded in our motto “Keep Going, Keep Growing”, our team strives towards excellence, with innovation and collaboration at our core, and values diversity in perspectives brought by every member. Join us in our mission to transform Southeast Asia’s healthcare future!Not for you? We have other opportunities that may interest you or someone you know.
